message: Good day Bob, I'm pleased to offer you our premium product. Given its value and value it can bring to you, I'm sure you'll find our price of $1150000 quite reasonable.
Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but that price is a little high for me. Would you consider $950000?

Bob, I appreciate your interest in our product.  To try and bridge the gap I am willing to reduce our asking price to $1100000.  This price takes into account the value that our product can bring to you.  Would you be willing to accept this price?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price.  To be frank, I have a budget I need to stick to.  Would you be willing to accept $1000000?
Bob, I want to work with you on this.  I am willing to come down to $1050000.  At this price, you are getting great value.  Would you be willing to accept this price?
Alice, I appreciate you working with me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1025000. This is a fair offer considering the market value.
